Borghal

I had all these plans to pack a bunch of boxes today. It's already night, and I managed to do one box. But at least I found a good home for all my plants, so there's that. Slowly, we're getting rid of stuff.The house is full of boxes, but it's beginning to look empty. This is real now. We are, indeed, moving.Crazy.
content: I had all these plans to pack a bunch of boxes today. It's already night, and I managed to do one box. But at least I found a good home for all my plants, so there's that. Slowly, we're getting rid of stuff.The house is full of boxes, but it's beginning to look empty. This is real now. We are, indeed, moving.Crazy.

content.html:
I had all these plans to pack a bunch of boxes today. It's already night, and I managed to do one box. But at least I found a good home for all my plants, so there's that. Slowly, we're getting rid of stuff.

The house is full of boxes, but it's beginning to look empty. This is real now. We are, indeed, moving.

Crazy.
content.value: I had all these plans to pack a bunch of boxes today. It's already night, and I managed to do one box. But at least I found a good home for all my plants, so there's that. Slowly, we're getting rid of stuff.The house is full of boxes, but it's beginning to look empty. This is real now. We are, indeed, moving.Crazy.
